title: Part 217 - Access To Court Interpreter Services For Persons With Limited English Proficiency
content:
Part 217 - Access To Court Interpreter Services For Persons With Limited English Proficiency

State Regulations
§ 217.1 - Obligation to appoint interpreter in court proceedings in the trial courts
§ 217.2 - Provision of interpreting services in clerk's offices

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
